Exist:
Yes! This year HackUPC has a Hardware Lab! :tada:
 So excited to see your hardware projects.
We are so proud for confirming that yes, there are a lot of Hardware! :robot_face:
Help: I can tell you about how to request hardware or which available hardware we have just asking me about this :blush:
How: On your MyHackUPC (https://my.hackupc.com) you can request as many hardware articles as you need for your project. In that page you can find a list of the hardware available. Once requested, the hardware is reserved for you for a certain amount of time. Before the time's up, you can go to the Hardware Lab desk (same location as InfoDesk or Baggage Check-in) to retrieve the item. To retrieve the item you'll have to leave an ID in the desk, so don't forget to take it with you! :smile:
List: For sure! :ok_hand: This is our Hardware Lab :arrow_down:
- 10x Raspberry Pi B+ + Basic modul + MicroSD 16/32GB
- 2x Leap motion UNIVERSAL VR DEV BUNDLE
- 3x Arduino board based on esp32 with Wi-Fi
